dublin_core.dcvalue: Neel Arant Bandy, PhD Candidate, Co-principal Investigator, Curtin University, Email: neelarant@gmail.com
Kakamega County General Hospital, Kakamega Kenya

This application combines electronic medical records and a clinical decision support system to support the clinic, clinician, and patient in the delivery of care in order to reduce perinatal transmission rates of HIV.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:19:19Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 mobile_app_for_management_of_hiv_in_pregnancy.pdf: 195246 bytes, checksum: eaae016fc4336947ba7e7c0057ca8353 (MD5)

Client education and behavior change communication, Data collection and reporting, Electronic decision support, Electronic health records, Provider-to-provider communication, Provider training and education, HIV/AIDS, Infectious diseases, Malaria and other vector-borne diseases, Maternal health, Newborn health, Sexual and reproductive health
